snippet: The reunions would be a way to improve tense ties between North and South Korea, allowing meetings of relatives who have been split for decades.
abstract: North Korea rejects South Korea's proposal to hold reunions of older relatives separated by Korean War, saying mood is not right; says it may be open to holding reunions in future.
lead_paragraph: The reunions would be a way to improve tense ties between North and South Korea, allowing meetings of relatives who have been split for decades.

headline.main: North Korea Rejects South’s Bid for Family Reunions
